attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The red arrows are positive aspect of our way of life. The Red Arrows demonstrate to the rest of the world the skills that the RAF have. They are always have been ambasidors for this country, where ever they have appeared and in my opinion it would be an insult if they are not allowed to appear

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
